UniverseEncrypted

Open protocol for connecting Wallets to Dapps

What is UniverseEncrypted?

UniverseEncrypted is an open source protocol for connecting decentralised applications to mobile wallets with QR code scanning or deep linking. A user can interact securely with any Dapp from their mobile phone, making  wallets a safer choice compared to desktop or browser extension wallets.

How does it work?

UniverseEncrypted connects web applications to supported mobile wallets session is started by a scanning a QR code (desktop) or by clicking an application deep link (mobile).
